name: Shoot Till You Die (Full game)
description:
The skeleton "Dave Skeletberg" has been woken from his slumber, and he's not happy...

Description

This is a simple shoot em' up. Surivive for as long as possible, but watch out! when the timer reaches 0, the boss spawns. If you defeat the boss, you win the stage. Along the way you can get a bunch of different upgrades and weapons. Combine perks and stats to make your weapons stronger.

Pro tip: When you level up; the killed enemy automatically drops a die. The type of die dropped depends on the type of enemy killed. The die an enemy dropped is often represented by the color of the enemy, red blue or yellow.

Dices

Listed below are the different dices that you can pick up. Theses dices increase your weapons stats, what stat it increases correspond with what color the dice is.

Dice Description Red Increases damage Blue Increases fire rate Yellow Increases reload speed Pink Gives your weapon a random perk Perks

The list below shows the perks that you can get on a weapon. Every perk is stackable and you can have a max number of five perks per weapon.

Perk Decsription Fire Sets enemies on fire Explosion Your weapon does extra damage and splash damage when a bullet hits Freeze Makes an enemy slower until they can't move Vampire Recover HP when an enemy is killed Spread Shoot 2 extra bullets Ammo Capacity Increases the amount the weapons ammo capacity by 2

Good luck surviving, you'll need it...
